| A redcap:* needs a pick-axe to tunnel through walls.
* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can [follow](/wiki/Follower "Follower") you to other levels.
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame. |                                |

A **redcap** is a [minor demon](/wiki/Minor_demon "Minor demon") in *[SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack")* and *[Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM")*.

Redcaps usually are generated with [scythes](/wiki/Scythe "Scythe").

## Encyclopaedia entry

The redcap (or powrie) is a type of malevolent, murderous goblin  
found in Border folklore. He is said to inhabit ruined castles along  
the Anglo-Scottish border, especially those that were the scenes of  
tyranny or wicked deeds and is known for soaking his cap in the blood  
of his victims.

\[ Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia ]
html:
Redcap

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
i redcap File:Redcap.png
Difficulty 7
Attacks Bite 1d2, Weapon 2.4, Claw 1d4
i redcap File:Redcap.png
Difficulty 7
Attacks

Bite 1d2, Weapon 2.4, Claw 1d4

Base level 10
Base experience ?
Speed 15
Base AC 2
Base MR 30
Alignment 7 (lawful)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 300
Nutritional value 200
Size Small
Resistances Poison
Resistances conveyed Poison

A redcap:

  • needs a pick-axe to tunnel through walls.
  • can survive underwater.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can follow you to other levels.
  • is strong.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • may turn against you when tame.

A redcap is a minor demon in SpliceHack and Hack'EM.

Redcaps usually are generated with scythes.

Encyclopaedia entry


The redcap (or powrie) is a type of malevolent, murderous goblin
found in Border folklore. He is said to inhabit ruined castles along
the Anglo-Scottish border, especially those that were the scenes of
tyranny or wicked deeds and is known for soaking his cap in the blood
of his victims.

[ Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia ]

Redcaps usually are generated with [[scythe]]s.
